snippet: When word got out about “Start-Ups: Silicon Valley,” the valley started to have conniptions. Of course the real geeks of Mountain View and Menlo Park are smart enough to know that reality is the last thing to expect from a Bravo reality show....

headline.main: Critic’s Notebook: ‘Start-Ups: Silicon Valley’ and ‘LOLwork’ on Bravo
